bibl.title: Two Ostraca Fragments of the Septuagint Psalter.
bibl.note: Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago. O. Medinet Habu Inv. 1269. Greek, Ps. 20: 1b-5a. 6th or 7th cent. A.D. (= van Haelst 122). - Inv. 1175. Bilingual. Ps. 30: 2-8 in Greek and Ps. 30: 1-6 in Sahidic. 7th or 8th cent. A.D. (= van Haelst 132).
bibl.seg: 142.13 / 142.4 O. Medinet Habu Inv. 1175 142.4 O. Medinet Habu Inv. 1269
Wikgren Allen, Two Ostraca Fragments of the Septuagint Psalter.

Oriental Institute of the University of Chicago. O. Medinet Habu Inv. 1269. Greek, Ps. 20: 1b-5a. 6th or 7th cent. A.D. (= van Haelst 122). - Inv. 1175. Bilingual. Ps. 30: 2-8 in Greek and Ps. 30: 1-6 in Sahidic. 7th or 8th cent. A.D. (= van Haelst 132).
